name: KOIOS MBTI
description:
// Play in FULL SCREEN VIEW //

Discover your personality type through an interactive personality test game created by the team behind KOIOS. 

  • Interact with KOIOS characters and let them guide you.
  • Answer five questions in each level until you have your four-letter MBTI.
  • Learn more about the other MBTI personality types.

Controls:

D/Right Arrow Key - Move Right

A/Left Arrow Key - Move Left

Spacebar - Jump

E - Interact with NPC and Doors

Game Developer: Blessie Carag
